params._to: Address to withdraw fees in to

approveToken(address,address,uint256).notice: Allows the owner to withdraw stuck ERC20 tokens.

createEscrow(bytes16,address,address,uin.notice: Create and fund a new escrow.

setArbitrator(address).notice: Set the arbitrator to a new address. Only the owner can call this.

setOwner(address).notice: Change the owner to a new address.

setRelayer(address).notice: Change the relayer to a new address.

transferToken(address,address,uint256).notice: Allows the owner to withdraw stuck ERC20 tokens.

transferTokenFrom(address,address,addres.notice: Allows the owner to withdraw stuck ERC20 tokens.

withdrawFees(address,uint256).notice: Withdraw fees collected by the contract. Only the owner can call this.
